0: On another note good to hear that various renovations are soon underway

That said we were disappointed to learn that the fitness center was under renovation and equipment was scattered though out guest rooms and the indoor pool and hot tub were closed none of which was noted on the website
Although this hotel is in a nice area I would think that the Ritz would look into refurbishing it and training the staff
We had a minor plumbing issue a call to the desk had a maintenance person at our door in under five minutes
Furniture in the lounge could also use updating as it was worn looking
it is still a favorite but would like to see major renovations to the rooms without the loss of its old school charm
The hotel needs a major refresh update
The rooms could use an update but overall a good experience
I travel quite a bit for business and it is great to see updated and working fitness equipment
According to the front desk the hotel is going to be renovating the guest rooms next year
1: The decor was very pleasant the bellman said that the rooms had recently been renovated
We recently stayed in a renovated suite at the St Louis Ritz Carlton
The rooms have just been updated and were very nice
And the newly remodeled upper floors are stunning in shades of blue
Recently renovated room was bright and modern although the lobby was older and more traditional Ritz
Our room was clean spacious renovated recently marble bathroom our view from the balcony was grand of the front driveway below that was circular
Since our last visit the hotel had been renovated
The rooms have been recently renovated and they are extremely nice
They updated the bathrooms on the 17th and 18th floors
